message.crinklecraft.contract.chat1: [CrinkleCraft] CrinkleCraft was created for lighthearted, age-regressive themed fun in a safe community setting. Keep it cozy â€”stuffie- energy only.
message.crinklecraft.contract.chat2: [CrinkleCraft] This mod does NOT endorse, encourage, or condone any explicit, sexual, or illegal content. By signing, you acknowledge you understand this mod's intended purpose and agree to use it responsibly.
message.crinklecraft.contract.sign_hint: [CrinkleCraft] To accept: /crinklecraft contract sign <secret> (the secret word is in the contract above)
command.crinklecraft.contract.signed: Contract signed. Thank you for playing responsibly!
command.crinklecraft.contract.wrong_secr: Incorrect secret word. Please read the contract and try again.
item.crinklecraft.cloth_diaper.tooltip: Reusable. Wash in water or craft with water bucket to reset uses.
item.crinklecraft.training_pants.tooltip: Reusable. Fewer uses than cloth. Wash in water or craft with water bucket.
item.crinklecraft.magic_diaper.tooltip: Slowly regains uses over time when equipped.
item.crinklecraft.potty_chart.tooltip: Right-click to view your potty chart (successes, accidents, stars)
message.crinklecraft.accident.self.absor: You hear a hiss and notice your underwear got warmer.
Your diaper did its job. Time for a change soon.
Phew, caught in time. Better get changed.
message.crinklecraft.accident.self.leake: You feel your protection leak and pee run down your leg onto the floor.
Oops. You might want to clean up.
Your protection gave out. Find a change.
message.crinklecraft.accident.nearby.abs: You hear a faint hiss somewhere nearby.
message.crinklecraft.accident.nearby.lea: You hear drops of water landing nearby...
You hear drops of water somewhere nearby...
command.crinklecraft.diaper.success: You used your diaper. Are you even trying to make it to the potty?
command.crinklecraft.diaper.not_in_check: You are not in a potty skill check right now.
command.crinklecraft.diaper.no_diaper: You don't have a diaper equipped. Get one one before accidents happen
command.crinklecraft.diaper.already_used: Your diaper is already used up to capacity. Get a change quick
command.crinklecraft.diaper.gauge_too_lo: Pee or mess gauge must be at least %s%% to use diaper.
command.crinklecraft.holdit.not_in_check: You are not in a potty skill check right now.
command.crinklecraft.caregiver.cannot_se: You cannot add yourself as a caregiver.
advancement.crinklecraft.first_success.d: Hold it during a potty check.
advancement.crinklecraft.comfy.title: Comfy
advancement.crinklecraft.comfy.descripti: Get the Comforted effect from holding a stuffie.
message.crinklecraft.design_philosophy: CrinkleCraft is designed for cozy, non-explicit, care-focused play. We don't support explicit content. We hope customization and care mechanics give you a satisfying experience.
